definition[0]: to feel extremely sad, especially because someone you love has died
example[0]: People need time to grieve after the death of a loved one.
example[1]: She grieved the loss of her only son.
example[2]: He died, and every day since then I have grieved for him.
definition[1]: if something grieves you, it makes you feel very unhappy
example[3]: My aunt, it grieves me to say, gets things confused.
